description: A trend-following strategy using EMA crossover with dynamic position sizing based on risk management. Uses custom stoploss based on lowest price over a period.
author: Unknown

populate_indicators.description: Calculate EMA indicators and lowest price for risk management
populate_indicators.pseudocode:
1. Calculate MIN (lowest value) over min_price_period (14)
2. Calculate fast EMA with period 12
3. Calculate slow EMA with period 26
4. Store as fastMA and slowMA columns

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: pandas DataFrame with columns: open, high, low, close, volume

populate_indicators.output_description: DataFrame with added indicators: lowest, fastMA, slowMA
populate_indicators.logic_explanation: Uses TA-Lib to calculate the lowest price over 14 periods for risk management, and fast/slow EMAs for trend detection.

populate_buy_trend.description: Generate buy signals based on EMA crossover and price action
populate_buy_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check if fastMA > slowMA (bullish trend)
2. Check if close > fastMA (price above fast EMA)
3. Check volume > 0
4. If all conditions true, set buy = 1
populate_buy_trend.output_description: DataFrame with buy column indicating buy signals (1 = buy, 0 = no action)
populate_buy_trend.logic_explanation: Looks for bullish trend confirmation when fast EMA is above slow EMA and price breaks above fast EMA, indicating momentum continuation.

populate_sell_trend.description: Generate sell signals based on EMA crossover and price action
populate_sell_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check if fastMA < slowMA (bearish trend)
2. Check if close < fastMA (price below fast EMA)
3. Check volume > 0
4. If all conditions true, set sell = 1
populate_sell_trend.output_description: DataFrame with sell column indicating sell signals (1 = sell, 0 = no action)
populate_sell_trend.logic_explanation: Identifies bearish trend when fast EMA drops below slow EMA and price breaks below fast EMA, signaling trend reversal.

custom_stoploss.description: Dynamic stoploss based on lowest price over period
custom_stoploss.pseudocode:
1. Get latest candle data
2. Extract lowest price from indicators
3. Calculate percentage difference from current rate
4. Return stoploss percentage
custom_stoploss.output_description: Dynamic stoploss percentage based on lowest price
custom_stoploss.logic_explanation: Uses the lowest price over the specified period as stoploss level, providing dynamic risk management that adapts to market volatility.

custom_stake_amount.description: Position sizing based on maximum loss per trade
custom_stake_amount.pseudocode:
1. Get stop price from lowest indicator
2. Calculate volume based on max_loss_per_trade
3. Calculate stake amount = volume * current_rate
4. Return calculated stake amount
custom_stake_amount.output_description: Calculated stake amount based on risk management
custom_stake_amount.logic_explanation: Implements fixed dollar risk per trade by calculating position size based on the difference between entry price and stop loss level.

indicators.name: MIN (Lowest)
indicators.description: Lowest value over specified period for dynamic stoploss calculation

indicators.name: EMA Fast
indicators.description: Fast Exponential Moving Average for trend detection

indicators.name: EMA Slow
indicators.description: Slow Exponential Moving Average for trend confirmation

buy_conditions.description: EMA bullish crossover with price confirmation
buy_conditions.logic: fastMA > slowMA AND close > fastMA AND volume > 0

sell_conditions.description: EMA bearish crossover with price confirmation
sell_conditions.logic: fastMA < slowMA AND close < fastMA AND volume > 0
